title: Letter Home- plain English and good writing

content.question: Which of the following does the speaker imply about her “plain English and good writing” (line 6) ?

choices.label: That she had an inflated sense of how adept she was at these skills
That she had mistakenly believed that these skills would be sufficient to get her a job
That she should have spent less time developing these skills and more time learning practical tasks
That she did not realize most businesses had little use for employees with these skills

content.answer: That she had mistakenly believed that these skills would be sufficient to get her a job

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
